Reine Swart (née Malan) bụ onye nduzi South Africa, onye edemede na onye na-eme ihe nkiri

Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Afrikaans bụ Die Pro (2015). Ọ pụtara n'akụkụ Tye Sheridan, Bel Powley na Emory Cohen na ihe nkiri Detour (2016). Na telivishọn, ọ pụtara na usoro SyFy Dominion, usoro kykNET, Villa Rosa, na usoro CBBC Jamillah na Aladdin.
Swart bụ onye isi na Siembamba nke Darrell Roodt (2017). Reine rụrụ ọrụ ya na James Badge Dale na 20th Century Fox's The Empty Man (2018).
N'afọ 2018, Swart mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri egwu Heks, nke e wepụtara na South Africa n'okpuru aha Her Mask na United States dịka The Hex n'afọ 2020
N'otu afọ ahụ, Swart so n'otu ndị na-eme ihe nkiri egwu egwu Triggered, nke a tọhapụrụ na United States na Nọvemba afọ 2020 na South Africa na Jenụwarị 2021
O sokwa dee ihe nkiri egwu na-abịanụ Flesh, nke Danielle Harris na-eme, ya na onye nduzi ihe nkiri ahụ, Chris McGowan.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na nzere na Injinia Ụlọ Ọrụ na Mahadum Pretoria n'afọ 2012.
